Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cn-AMP2 (XXA; C. nucifera antimicrobial peptide 2, natural AMPs;  plants; BBBh2o)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against plant pathogens Gram- X. arboricola pv. pruni and  P. syringae pv. actinidiae (MIC12.5-25 uM) (Cam√≥ C et al. 2019).  Cn-AMP2 has activity against human glioblastoma (Prabhu S et al. 2014). Also, Cn-AMP2 can form amyloid by itself (Amyloid AMPs) (Gour et al., 2016).Updated 12/2018; 11/2019; 12/2024.
Literature Information.Author: Mandal SM, Dey S, Mandal M, Maria-Neto S, Franco OL.2009
Literature Information.Title: Identification and structural insights of three novel antimicrobial peptides isolated from green coconut water.
